Name: }bedrock.hier.sub.create.byelement

Parameters.Name: pAddToSubset
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Add to subset if it already exists (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pExpandConsol
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Replace consolidations with their descendants or their leaf level descendants (0 = No, 1 = Descendants, 2 = N Level Descendants. Default = 1)

Parameters.Name: pTemp
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delete/create temporary objects (0 = Do not delete, 1 = Delete, 2 = if view and subsets are created, keep only subsets)

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pJson
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: JSON Object with process parameter values. This will overwrite user passed parameters for all included parameters.
